amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 116-6 to clarify that the child care benefit be made available for veterans while they are traveling to or attending VA appointments and not at any other time.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Radewagen amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mrs. Radewagen.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Radewagen amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
